## Thank you for your interest! üôè

This is a personal portfolio project and **pull requests are not accepted**.

If you've found a bug or have a suggestion, please:

1. Close this PR
2. Open an **issue** instead describing the problem or suggestion
3. I'll review and implement the fix myself

**Why?** This keeps the codebase consistent with my personal coding style and vision for the project.

Thank you for understanding! Feel free to fork this project for your own use under the MIT License.
